name.cns: 剧团技能范围增加卷(15日)
name.jp: ラージスキルエリア(15日)
name.vi: Nâng cao phạm vi kỹ năng của nhóm 15

description.en: Known as the "Red Scroll" in some circles, this powerful party item enhances Party Skills, negating their distance limitations. Lasts 15 days.
description.ar: Known as the "Red Scroll" in some circles, this powerful party item enhances Party Skills, negating their distance limitations. Lasts 15 days.
description.br: Conhecido como o "Pergaminho Vermelho" em alguns círculos, este poderoso item de grupo aprimora as Habilidades do Grupo, negando suas limitações de distância. Dura 15 dias.
description.cns: 在某些圈子中被称为“红色卷轴”，这个强大的剧团物品可以扩大剧团技能的范围，消除他们的距离限制。持续15天。
description.de: Diese Schriftrolle maximiert den Wirkungskreis der Partyskills. Voraussetzung: Gleicher Channel. Der Leader führt dieses Item und die Skills aus und jedes Partymitglied profitiert ohne in seiner Nähe sein zu müssen. Der Effekt hält 15 Tage an.
description.fi: Known as the "Red Scroll" in some circles, this powerful party item enhances Party Skills, negating their distance limitations. Lasts 15 days.
description.fil: Known as the "Red Scroll" in some circles, this powerful party item enhances Party Skills, negating their distance limitations. Lasts 15 days.
description.fr: Parchemin à activer par le leader et permettant à tous les membres du groupe de bénéficier de l'effet des compétences de groupe, quelle que soit leur position - une fois activé, le parchemin dure 15 jours.
description.id: Dikenal sebagai "Red Scroll" di beberapa kalangan, item party yang kuat ini meningkatkan Skill Party, meniadakan batasan jarak mereka. Berlangsung selama 15 hari.
description.it: Known as the "Red Scroll" in some circles, this powerful party item enhances Party Skills, negating their distance limitations. Lasts 15 days.
description.jp: 巷では「レッドスクロール」と呼ばれ、パーティースキルの適応範囲を解除するパーティー用アイテムです。使用期限は15日間。
description.nl: Known as the "Red Scroll" in some circles, this powerful party item enhances Party Skills, negating their distance limitations. Lasts 15 days.
description.pl: Known as the "Red Scroll" in some circles, this powerful party item enhances Party Skills, negating their distance limitations. Lasts 15 days.
description.ru: Снимает ограничения на дальность действия умений труппы. Свиток исчезает через 15 дней.
description.sp: Este poderoso objeto de party mejora las Habilidades de Party, anulando sus limitaciones de distancia. Dura 15 días.
description.sw: Known as the "Red Scroll" in some circles, this powerful party item enhances Party Skills, negating their distance limitations. Lasts 15 days.
description.th: ไอเท็มปาร์ตี้อันทรงพลังนี้รู้จักกันในนาม "Red Scroll"  ซึ่งจะช่วยเสริมทักษะปาร์ตี้ ลบล้างข้อจำกัดด้านระยะ 15 วัน
description.tw: 內行人稱其為「紅色卷軸」，這個強大的隊伍物品強化了劇團技能，消除劇團技能的限制範圍，效果持續 15 天。
description.vi: Được gọi là "Red Scroll" trong một số vòng kết nối, vật phẩm mạnh mẽ của bữa tiệc này nâng cao các Kỹ năng của nhóm, loại bỏ các giới hạn về khoảng cách của chúng. Kéo dài 15 ngày.
